data.title: Chris Evert Children's Hospital at Broward Health Medical Center Profile at PracticeLink
data.text:
Chris Evert Children’s Hospital at Broward Health Medical Center, Ft. Lauderdale, FL

Envision Physician Services is currently seeking a fulltime Pediatrician to join us.

Requirements: BC/Pediatrician with active practice in PEDs ED for a minimum of three years and/or a Pediatrician with Fellowship training in Pediatric Emergency Medicine.

This newer Pediatric Emergency Department is a state-designated Level I Pediatric Trauma Center and features all the latest technology. The Children’s Hospital features a 63-bed Level III NICU, a 12-bed Ronald McDonald House PICU and a 50-bed inpatient Pediatric unit. Join a stable group of pediatricians with a long history of excellence.

• 30,000 Annual Visits

•Envision Physician Services Pediatric Hospitalist and OB/GYN coverage 14/7

•12 Bed ED with 2 Bed Fast Track

•44 Hours of Physician Coverage

•Cerner Documentation

Fort Lauderdale is famous for its beaches, arts, culture and events. Located on the Atlantic coast 23 miles north of Miami it is the county seat of Broward County. It is a principal city in the South Florida metropolitan area, and home to more than 5,600,000 people.

Live and practice in one of the most sought after locations in the nation – sunny Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Florida has no state income tax, affordable housing, good schools and a wealth of recreational opportunities.
